Name: Heavy Rescue: 401
Title: You Wanna Fight?
Desc: John Allen spends a night battling a load of spilled scrap metal; Bill Wright makes a call.
LongDescription: When winter mounts a comeback, John Allen spends a night battling a load of spilled scrap metal; Collin faces a tight deadline on a double recovery; Bill Wright makes a call, leading to a farewell for Mitch.
